description: This sweatshirt is crafted from a smooth cotton blend and features our signature embroidered Pony at the front.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27" body length, an 18" shoulder, a 44" chest, and a 34.75" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Signature embroidered Pony at the center front.
This product is made with recycled polyester. By turning industrial and post-consumer polyester waste into new product, we are reducing our dependence on virgin petroleum-based material.
Shell: 66% cotton, 34% recycled polyester. Ribbed trim: 98% cotton, 2% elastane. Machine washable. Imported.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
